sqlMap.insert:
INSERT /*MS-YRD-CHARGE-NOTICE-INSERT*/ INTO charge_notice(id,form_id,business_bill_id,depart,team,notice_date,insurance_no,insurance_type_name,bill_customer_name,premium_amount,recievable_fee,recieved_fee,pay_fee,reserved_scale,notice_no,bill_no,insurance_broker_no,insurance_broker_name,commission_type,persistency_rate_ward,manage_grant,package_fee,insurance_other,row_add_time,row_update_time) VALUES (#id#,#formId#,#businessBillId#,#depart#,#team#,#noticeDate#,#insuranceNo#,#insuranceTypeName#,#billCustomerName#,#premiumAmount#,#recievableFee#,#recievedFee#,#payFee#,#reservedScale#,#noticeNo#,#billNo#,#insuranceBrokerNo#,#insuranceBrokerName#,#commissionType#,#persistencyRateWard#,#manageGrant#,#packageFee#,#insuranceOther#,#rowAddTime#,#rowUpdateTime#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
sqlMap.update: update /*MS-YRD-CHARGE-NOTICE-UPDATE*/ charge_notice set form_id=#formId#, business_bill_id=#businessBillId#, depart=#depart#, team=#team#, notice_date=#noticeDate#, insurance_no=#insuranceNo#, insurance_type_name=#insuranceTypeName#, bill_customer_name=#billCustomerName#, premium_amount=#premiumAmount.cent#, recievable_fee=#recievableFee.cent#, recieved_fee=#recievedFee.cent#, pay_fee=#payFee.cent#, reserved_scale=#reservedScale#, notice_no=#noticeNo#, bill_no=#billNo#, insurance_broker_no=#insuranceBrokerNo#, insurance_broker_name=#insuranceBrokerName#, commission_type=#commissionType#, persistency_rate_ward=#persistencyRateWard.cent#, manage_grant=#manageGrant.cent#, package_fee=#packageFee.cent#, insurance_other=#insuranceOther.cent#, row_add_time=#rowAddTime#, row_update_time=#rowUpdateTime# where (id = #id#)
sqlMap.select: select /*MS-YRD-CHARGE-NOTICE-FIND-BY-ID*/ id, form_id, business_bill_id, depart, team, notice_date, insurance_no, insurance_type_name, bill_customer_name, premium_amount, recievable_fee, recieved_fee, pay_fee, reserved_scale, notice_no, bill_no, insurance_broker_no, insurance_broker_name, commission_type, persistency_rate_ward, manage_grant, package_fee, insurance_other, row_add_time, row_update_time from charge_notice where (id = #value#)

SELECT /*MS-YRD-CHARGE-NOTICE-FIND-BY-CONDITION*/ id ,form_id ,business_bill_id ,depart ,team ,notice_date ,insurance_no ,insurance_type_name ,bill_customer_name ,premium_amount ,recievable_fee ,recieved_fee ,pay_fee ,reserved_scale ,notice_no ,bill_no ,insurance_broker_no ,insurance_broker_name ,commission_type,persistency_rate_ward ,manage_grant ,package_fee ,insurance_other ,row_add_time ,row_update_time FROM charge_notice where 1=1
$sortCol$
$sortOrder$
LIMIT #limitStart#,#pageSize#

select /*MS-YRD-CHARGE-NOTICE-FIND-BY-FORM-ID*/ id, form_id, business_bill_id, depart, team, notice_date, insurance_no, insurance_type_name, bill_customer_name, premium_amount, recievable_fee, recieved_fee, pay_fee, reserved_scale, notice_no, bill_no, insurance_broker_no, insurance_broker_name, commission_type, persistency_rate_ward, manage_grant, package_fee, insurance_other, row_add_time, row_update_time from charge_notice where (form_id = #value#)

select /*MS-YRD-CHARGE-NOTICE-FIND-BY-BUSINESS-BILL-ID*/ id, form_id, business_bill_id, depart, team, notice_date, insurance_no, insurance_type_name, bill_customer_name, premium_amount, recievable_fee, recieved_fee, pay_fee, reserved_scale, notice_no, bill_no, insurance_broker_no, insurance_broker_name, commission_type, persistency_rate_ward, manage_grant, package_fee, insurance_other, row_add_time, row_update_time from charge_notice where (business_bill_id = #value#)
